subject.Death category: Death category of individuals living with HIV
subject.Definition: Based on the CoDe protocol, AIDS-related cancers like cervical cancer were considered as ARM and other causes unrelated to HIV like lung cancer were categorized as NARD

subject.Death category: Death category of individuals living with HIV
subject.Definition: Unknown death categorized based on CD4 count within 6-months prior to the date of death. The CD4 cell count of lower than 200 cells/mm² was categorized as ARM and otherwise as NARM
